name: Empório Pasta & Pesto

address.full: Rua Dona Anunciada 114 Graças, Recife, Pernambuco 52011-100

description: We are a house that manufactures handmade Italian pastas and work with products always freshly manufacturing and own revenue, we have a varied menu that always seek to expand and an array of products ranging from breads International, Lavazza coffee and various wines. Quiet and comfortable environment with 6 tables and music shorty environment.
